guideline.name: Annotation of FDA Label for tafenoquine and G6PD

text.html: "ARAKODA [tafenoquine] is contraindicated in: patients with G6PD deficiency or unknown G6PD status due to the risk of hemolytic anemia...[and] breastfeeding by a lactating woman when the infant is found to be G6PD deficient or if the G6PD status of the infant is unknown..." See label for more information.

See label for more information.
